name: ReneSola Ltd
description: Established in 2005, ReneSola Ltd. (NYSE: SOL) is a leading global photovoltaic manufacturer with our own R&D team, advanced production equipment and deep production experience. ReneSola has 17 subsidiaries, with our own production bases distributed in Zhejiang Jiashan, Jiangsu Wuxi and Sichuan Meishan. We specialize in the R&D and manufacturing of polysilicon, silicon wafer and solar modules and are one of the few large Solar conglomerates with vertically integrated operations from virgin polysilicon to photovoltaic systems in the global photovoltaic industry.
address:
27 Qinqyuan Road (East)
Yixing Economic and Development Zone
Jiangsu Province
China
